title: Higashi no Eden Movie I: The King of Eden
title_en: Eden of The East the Movie I: The King of Eden
title_jp: 東のエデン 劇場版I The King of Eden
synopsis: The intrigue goes international in The King of Eden, a feature-length conspiracy thriller that continues the action of Eden of the East. The deadly game that began in Japan now intensifies on the streets of New York City. The rules are the same: do whatever it takes to win. Die if you lose.
